snippet: Alibaba said it would pay about $4.6 billion for the stake and planned to use the retailer’s stores to sell groceries and other items beyond gadgets.
abstract: Alibaba announces plan to buy 20 percent stake in Chinese brick-and-mortar electronics retailer Suning for $4.6 billion, about ten percent over current share price.
lead_paragraph: Alibaba said it would pay about $4.6 billion for the stake and planned to use the retailer’s stores to sell groceries and other items beyond gadgets.

headline.main: Alibaba to Buy 20% Stake in Electronics Retailer Suning
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Alibaba to Pay Premium for Struggling Retailer
